attributes.comment:
Dear Committee,
I am in the process of an internation adoption, I am also single and doing this
process alone and I am sure that you know the cost of an adoption. With the
proposed increase in fees, it will be even harder to adopt. Any slight increase in
the fee will effect so many families in this same situation. I pray that you will hear
the voice of many in the same situation and not put an increase on the
immigration process. Please it has been a long, hard and every expensive road
don't increase the fees. Many people are relying on you to help us. Thanks you
for your time, Mechelle Phelps

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Mechelle Phelps
